grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 召集【ショウシュウ】convening, calling together (e.g. parliament), call-up (for military service)
kun reading compounds: 召す【めす】to call, to invite, to send for, to summon, to eat, to drink, to put on, to wear, to ride, to catch (a cold), to take (a bath), to tickle (one's fancy), to put on (years), to commit (seppuku), to do, used to show respect
